original_text: Jacob heard that Shechem had had sex with his daughter. At that time, Jacob's sons were taking care of his animals in the fields. So he did not do anything until his sons came home.
korean_text: 야곱이 그 딸 디나를 그가 더럽혔다 함을 들었으나 자기의 아들들이 들에서 목축하므로 그들이 돌아오기까지 잠잠하였고

sentences.original_text: that Shechem had had sex with his daughter
Jacob's sons were taking care of his animals
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱의 아들들은 자기의 가축을 돌보고 있었다

sentences.original_text: So he did not do anything
